item.title: NBA_Social_Influence.Rmd
item.description: Dataset This dataset includes the on-court performance of 100 NBA players alongside their social influence and salary for the 2016-2017 season. The main measurement of social influence for this study is the number of twitter followers that a player has. Questions and Visualizations What is the relationship between a playerâ€™s salary and number of twitter followers? Do players that score more points also have more twitter followers? Does the team that a player is on affect their social influence?
